targets.query: SELECT sum("cpu") FROM "autogen"."cpustat" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
select sum("util") from (SELECT (sum("memused")*100 / sum("memtotal")) as "util" FROM "autogen"."memory" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT ("used"*100/"total") FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("nodename"::tag =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "type"::tag = 'dir') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "nodename"
SELECT "cpu" FROM "autogen"."cpustat" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY host
SELECT ("memused"*100 / "memtotal") FROM "autogen"."memory" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "netin", "netout" FROM "autogen"."nics" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "netin", "netout" FROM "autogen"."nics" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hosts$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "cpu" FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$vms$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT ("mem"*100/"maxmem") FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$vms$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT derivative(last("netin"), 1s) FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$vms$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host",time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(last("netout"), 1s) FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$vms$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host",time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(last("diskread"), 1s) FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$vms$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host",time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(last("diskwrite"), 1s) FROM "autogen"."system" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$vms$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host",time($__interval)

list.definition: show tag values from system with key = "host" where vmid =~ /\d+?/ and nodename =~/$hosts/
list.label: VMs
list.name: vms
list.query: show tag values from system with key = "host" where vmid =~ /\d+?/ and nodename =~/$hosts/
